news_header: At least three people were killed and others injured in a rare Russian drone and missile attack on Kyiv.
news_text: A rare attack on Kyiv resulted in the deaths of at least three people and injuries to others after Russia launched a barrage of drones and missiles. Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy confirmed the casualties, which were caused by a missile that fell in the Shevchenkivskyi district. The attack also damaged infrastructure, including an underground station and a water pipe. In addition to Kyiv, the southeastern city of Zaporizhzhia was also targeted, resulting in ten injuries. Ukraine's Air Force reported shooting down 24 drones and two missiles during the assault.
